name: SSF1

subtitle: Carcinoembryonic Antigen (CEA)
notes: **Note**:  Record the interpretation of the highest CEA test results documented in the medical record prior to treatment.  The interpretation should be for the same laboratory test recorded in CS Site-Specific Factor 3.
